text:
Puliyangudi police have recovered the body of a 40-year-old man with cut injuries from a well near Vellanaikottai village.

Police said the decomposed body with cut injuries on the head was retrieved from the well following complaint from Village Administrative Officer Azhagu Raja on Tuesday.

Police suspect that the body might have been dumped in the well after the man was murdered somewhere else.

Puliyangudi police have registered a case.
title: Body retrieved from well
